title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4026.6 - Emergency authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4026.6 - Emergency authority

State Regulations

In cases of emergency, authority to sign declarations
of partnerships may be given to The Jockey Club by printable electronic means
so long as such notice is given before the race. Such notice shall be promptly
confirmed in writing within 48 hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4026.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
